id.description: The unique identifier of the sequence

automationPercentage.description: The percentage of automation completion for the sequence

bounceCount.description: The number of bounced emails in the sequence

clickCount.description: The count of link clicks in the sequence

createdAt.description: The timestamp when the sequence was created

deliverCount.description: The number of successful email deliveries in the sequence

description.description: A brief overview of the sequence

durationInDays.description: The duration of the sequence in days

enabled.description: Indicates if the sequence is enabled

enabledAt.description: The timestamp when the sequence was enabled

failureCount.description: The count of failed steps in the sequence

finishOnReply.description: Flag to determine if the sequence finishes on receiving a reply

lastUsedAt.description: The timestamp when the sequence was last used

locked.description: Indicates if the sequence is locked

lockedAt.description: The timestamp when the sequence was locked

maxActivations.description: The maximum number of activations allowed for the sequence

negativeReplyCount.description: The count of negative replies received in the sequence

neutralReplyCount.description: The count of neutral replies received in the sequence

numContactedProspects.description: The number of prospects contacted in the sequence

numRepliedProspects.description: The number of prospects who replied to the sequence

openCount.description: The count of opened emails in the sequence

optOutCount.description: The count of opt-outs in the sequence

positiveReplyCount.description: The count of positive replies received in the sequence

primaryReplyAction.description: The action taken on receiving the primary reply

primaryReplyPauseDuration.description: The duration to pause after receiving the primary reply

replyCount.description: The total count of replies received in the sequence

schedule.description: The scheduling details for the sequence

scheduleCount.description: The total count of schedules configured for the sequence

scheduleIntervalType.description: The type of interval used in the scheduling of the sequence

secondaryReplyAction.description: The action taken on receiving the secondary reply

secondaryReplyPauseDuration.description: The duration to pause after receiving the secondary reply

sequenceStepCount.description: The total count of steps in the sequence

shareType.description: The type of sharing permissions for the sequence

tags.description: The tags associated with the sequence

throttleCapacity.description: The maximum capacity for throttling in the sequence

throttleMaxAddsPerDay.description: The maximum number of additions per day allowed in throttling

throttlePaused.description: Indicates if throttling is paused for the sequence

throttlePausedAt.description: The timestamp when throttling was paused for the sequence

transactional.description: Indicates if the sequence is transactional

updatedAt.description: The timestamp when the sequence was last updated

calls.description: The call actions associated with the sequence

contentCategoryMemberships.description: The memberships of content categories for the sequence

mailings.description: The mailings associated with the sequence

ruleset.description: The ruleset defined for the sequence

sequenceStates.description: The different states/progress of the sequence

sequenceSteps.description: The individual steps of the sequence

tasks.description: The tasks linked to the sequence

updater.description: The last updater(s) of the sequence
